name: ROMBus - Ismaili Heritage and the Aga Khan Museum

location.name: Royal Ontario Museum - Queens Park Entrance

description:
Celebrate our 10th anniversary with a day filled with art, culture, and connection. 

See two stunning new exhibitions, "Your Way Begins on the Other Side" by renowned Pakistani artist Aisha Khalid and "Cosmic Diagrams" by Kour Pour. Enjoy a guided tour of the museum’s acclaimed collection that offers fresh and engaging insight into Islamic civilizations and cultural stories. 

At the neighbouring Ismaili Centre, we’ll learn about the values of this remarkable community, knowledge, pluralism, and service, followed by lunch at Diwan, in the Aga Khan Museum. After, stroll through the beautifully landscaped park to encounter #hopeandhealingcanada, a vibrant installation by artist Tracey-Mae Chambers, woven with messages of connection and reconciliation.
